name: Backyard Football 2009
synopsis: Backyard Football 09 is the latest and greatest version of the best selling kid's football video game series. Get realistic, hard-hitting football action with Super Bowl champ Tom Brady and other players like Tony Romo, Ray Lewis, Peyton Manning, LaDainian Tomlinson, Steve Smith, Adrian Petersen and other NFL super stars as kids. Build your dream team from 15 pro players as kids; put them on your favorite NFL team or a wacky Backyard team. Outrageous power ups and unlockables combined with authentic football action make Backyard Football '09 the most fun you can have off the field.
